summary: This document contains customer due diligence information for various signers associated with accounts at First Bank, including details about their identities, employment, and financial information. It also includes corporate resolutions and articles of incorporation for Southern Trust Company, Inc. and Financial Informatics, Inc.

Jeffrey Epstein is the President of Southern Trust Company, Inc.
Financial Informatics, Inc. was incorporated on November 18, 2011.
Darren Indyke is an attorney and has provided his employment details.
The document includes customer due diligence information for various signers associated with accounts at First Bank.
